SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreEmailTemplate] ( [CoreEmailTemplate_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_Codice] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_Titolo] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_Descrizione] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_Subject] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_SenderName] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_MailText] varchar(MAX) NULL , [Lingue_Ky] tinyint NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreEmailTemplate_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreEmailTemplate] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreEmailTemplate PRIMARY KEY ([CoreEmailTemplate_Ky])
